Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory172.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "Her wounds... Get her in the truck. We'll handle the rest.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'On your way back to the city, you run into the traveling Support Force agents. You follow their instructions and put Lucia in the transport truck.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "She's in pretty bad shape. What on earth happened...?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'The Ascendants happened.', 3: '14', 4: 'Is she gonna be okay?', 5: '17'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "The Ascendants...? Then you guys must be Gray Raven. It's incredible you made it here alive. Elite squad indeed.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "But we didn't even get anything done. Worse, we...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Just the fact that you're all alive is something.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Yes, as long as we can keep her M.I.N.D. alive. But she's not returning to the battlefield any time soon.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Anyway, first things first, we gotta bring her back to our base. You guys go ahead and return to battle.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With that, Bridget motions the driver to start the truck and hops on the back.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Lucia should be fine with the SF people. Now we need to figure out our next move...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Then from here on out, let me assist Gray Raven!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'A cheerful voice from a scythe-wielding Construct dispels the gloom—Ayla. Like always, she is in that painterly frame of hers, looking out of place in a battlefield.'}
{2: 'What are you doing here, Ayla?', 3: '28', 4: 'Assist...?', 5: '29'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "President Hassen issued a call to arms. I'm not a combatant, but I know I gotta be a part of this!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'I rushed over as soon as I learned what happened to Lucia. So let me help out, Commandant!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'And besides...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Ayla pauses and fishes through her decorative backpack, then displays a strangely shaped device.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Good, now we can talk. Gray Raven, how am I sounding?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mr. President?', 3: '38', 4: 'Why this device?', 5: '40'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "...You must be wondering why I'm speaking to you via Ayla's connection device.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Must be the scrambler waves from Kowloong. Not sure if it's effective against the Ascendants, but it sure messed up our comms systems.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Kowloong is broadcasting a scrambling signal. This is the only way I can contact you from outside the city.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "We're already at work fixing the connection, but I'm afraid it's gonna take a while, so I had this comms device sent to you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'You have new orders for us, I take it?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Originally, several, yes. But there's been a change of plans. One of the Ascendants, Gabriel, launched a surprise assault, so now I need you to go there and stop him.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Of course, I've sent other squads too. And let me repeat this—the Ascendants are after the Gestalt-grade terminal within the light wall.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Stop them at all costs. I'm counting on you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Understood.', 3: '47', 4: 'Can we really defeat the Ascendants?', 5: '48'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Good. Now take Ayla with you and go.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Not like we can just surrender. But you know that already, 【kuroname】.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Oh, and President Hassen!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Who was it that saved us on the bridge?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'They... are the fruits of our labor.', 4: '2'}
